name: Indoor Rug: "Starlit Night"
description: A richly patterned, blue square rug featuring a traditional, symmetrical pattern that can be found at the Curatorium of Secrets in Nasha Town. Its designer once explained the design concept this way: "At the heart of the dark night sky, a single star shines brightly above. Perhaps this image can offer a spark of inspiration to those feeling weary or downhearted."
